[Portrait]Folmarv
[Dialog]I fear I've no more time to waste on you.

Would that I could bid you farewell here,
but I suspect you'd not part ways so
easily.
I suppose you must be returned to the
Father after all. My thralls will delight to
guide you to His keeping.
This sanctuary even holds a sarcophagus.
It's as though Fate lends her hand!{END}

Of course, death is sooner served
by steel. I shall let this one be your
foeman as well.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Zalbaag!{END}

Once he was your brother, but
he is reborn unto us now.

You're a heretic already. Why
not a kinslayer? *chuckle*{END}

Ever the coward!{END}

[Portrait]Folmarv's Voice
[Dialog]Zalbaag! Deliver me the head of
that young man before you!
He must not leave this cathedral
alive!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Lord Brother, it's I! Do you
not know your own blood?{END}

[Portrait]Zalbaag
[Dialog]...<Ramza>? Is that you?

What...what is this place? It is so
dark, and I...I cannot see.

Am I-what am I doing? Do I stand?
Sit? I have no...no sensation. It's as
though I...had no limbs.{END}

You are being controlled by
Lord Folmarv-by a Lucavi!{END}

Am I...fighting you? Why...why
would I do such a thing?

<Ramza>...flee. Flee, or...
or I may strike you down.{END}

Lord Brother! Heed not the
false feelings in your mind!{END}

[Portrait]Zalbaag
[Dialog]I...I beg you, <Ramza>-
kill...kill me.
The pain-it's blinding. I cannot feel
my arms or...or my legs, and yet-and
yet somehow they burn!
And my memories-they turn to smoke.
I...I am afraid, <Ramza>, as I...
as I have never been before.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Do not give in! There must be a
way for you to overcome this!
We will find it! Please, do not
abandon hope!{END}

Hope...abandons me. I ask only
for...for mercy, <Ramza>...

Someone whispers...in my ear.
Whispers, beckons...cries, and
taunts...
Oh, gods, end it...please! Grant...
grant me swift mercy.{END}

Damn you, Folmarv!{END}

[Portrait]Zalbaag
[Dialog]F-forgive me, <Ramza>.
I have...have caused you pain.
Alma... Please...save Alma. You
are her...only hope.

F-farewell, my brother.


And...thank you.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Zalbaag-!{END}
